name: Mutants
description:
Do you like platformers? Check out our new game Drylands, post-apocalyptic platformer with tons of quests, action, rpg!

Enjoy this new endless action platforming mayhem, select your firearms along a great variety and start shooting your way!

Key features:
* Endless replayability
* Lots of upgradeable weapons, explosives and attack drones will help you in this destructive mayhem
* Different waves and lots of incresing difficulty missions keeps your gameplay diverse forever!
* Great fun for both short sessions or extended plays
* Amazing pixel art
* Universal
* Game Center achievements and leaderboard

Music by Christian Holmlund (http://chrizzly.newgrounds.com)

More info and Official Trailer:
www.angrybugs.com
